attributes.action: Make it illegal for cold callers to ring at doorbells after 6pm
attributes.additional_details:
We call for the government to change the laws regarding cold calling so that no unsolicited visits may take place after 6pm.

Such callers disrupt family time and meal times, disturb sleeping children and make vulnerable residents feel intimidated in their own homes.

These are unwanted intrusions into our private homes and must be stopped.
